Class SqlQuerys

java.lang.Object
SqlQuerys
public class SqlQuerys extends Object
The SqlQuerys class declaration

This class executes a set of instructions that interacts with the mySQL database 'poisepms'.

Version:
1.00 25 June 2024
Author:
Matthew-James Pether

  • Method Details

    • insertPersonQuery

      public static int insertPersonQuery(Person personObj, String personString)
      This Connects to the mySQL poisepms database and creates a direct line for running the appropriate queries. inserts the appropriate persons details in the appropriate persons table using mySQL statements.
      returns personObj.id if inserted correctly else returns -1 if something went wrong.
      Parameters:
      personObj - Stores the person object
      personString - Stores the name of the table as a string
      connection - Initiates a connection to the database via the jdbc:mysql: channel on localhost
      statement - initiates a direct line to the database to execute mySQL statements
      Returns:
      personObj.id

    • displayPeoplesQuery

      public static void displayPeoplesQuery(String personType, String fieldType)
      This Connects to the mySQL poisepms database and creates a direct line for running the appropriate queries. Selects the appropriate persons details in the appropriate persons table using mySQL statements. Stores the selected data in a variable and uses a while loop to display all the data in a table format.
      Parameters:
      personType - Stores the tables name as a String
      fieldType - Stores the name of the field that contains the ids of the corresponding table
      connection - Initiates a connection to the database via the jdbc:mysql: channel on localhost
      statement - initiates a direct line to the database to execute mySQL statements
      results - Stores the data selected by the mySQL statement

    • insertProjectQuery

      public static int insertProjectQuery(Scanner scan, Project newProject)
      This Connects to the mySQL poisepms database and creates a direct line for running the appropriate queries. Inserts the appropriate project details in the appropriate tables using mySQL statements and auto generates a project number in the database.
      Once the new project is inserted Selects the new project and stores the generated project number to be use in the project_costs table and returns the project number for later use
      Parameters:
      scan - initiates the Scanner class to get the users input
      newProject - Stores the new project object
      projectNum - stores the project number
      connection - Initiates a connection to the database via the jdbc:mysql: channel on localhost
      statement - initiates a direct line to the database to execute mySQL statements
      results - Stores the data selected by the mySQL statement
      Returns:
      projectNum

    • insertIdsQuery

      public static void insertIdsQuery(int projectNum, int strucEngiId, int contrId, int archiId, int custoId)
      This Connects to the mySQL poisepms database and creates a direct line for running the appropriate queries. Inserts the appropriate project number with the appropriate persons id into the project_ids table.
      Parameters:
      projectNum - Stores the project number
      strucEngiId - Stores the structural engineers id number
      contrId - Stores the contractors id number
      archiId - Stores the architect id number
      custoId - Stores the customer id number
      connection - Initiates a connection to the database via the jdbc:mysql: channel on localhost
      statement - initiates a direct line to the database to execute mySQL statements

    • searchPersonQuery

      public static Person searchPersonQuery(int id, String tableType, String fieldType)
      This Connects to the mySQL poisepms database and creates a direct line for running the appropriate queries. Searches the appropriate person and stores it into a person object which gets returned.
      Parameters:
      id - Stores the persons id number
      tableType - Stores the table the person will be found in
      fieldType - Stores the field name that will be compared
      personObj - Stores the info of the person into an object for later use
      connection - Initiates a connection to the database via the jdbc:mysql: channel on localhost
      statement - initiates a direct line to the database to execute mySQL statements
      results - Stores the data selected by the mySQL statement
      Returns:
      personObj

    • searchProjectQuery

      public static void searchProjectQuery(String condition)
      This Connects to the mySQL poisepms database and creates a direct line for running the appropriate queries. Searches for projects based on the appropriate conditions and displays them all using a loop in a table format
      If the finalised field in the projects table is marked as true it will displays 'finalised' else it will display 'no' if not
      Parameters:
      condition - Stores the condition of what the statement must execute
      connection - Initiates a connection to the database via the jdbc:mysql: channel on localhost
      statement - initiates a direct line to the database to execute mySQL statements
      results - Stores the data selected by the mySQL statement

    • searchProjNumQuery

      public static int searchProjNumQuery(String projectName)
      This Connects to the mySQL poisepms database and creates a direct line for running the appropriate queries. Searches for projects number based on the projects name and returns the project number for layer use
      Parameters:
      projectName - Stores the projects name
      projectNum - stores the projects number
      connection - Initiates a connection to the database via the jdbc:mysql: channel on localhost
      statement - initiates a direct line to the database to execute mySQL statements
      results - Stores the data selected by the mySQL statement
      Returns:
      projectNum

    • updateProjectQuery

      public static void updateProjectQuery(int projectNum, String newInfo, String fieldType)
      This Connects to the mySQL poisepms database and creates a direct line for running the appropriate queries. Updates the appropriate project infomation based on the project number and the field type. Calls a method to displays the updated project if done successfully.
      If a specific field entered the code will convert the information from string to the approprate data type before updating the database.
      Parameters:
      projectNum - Stores the project number
      newInfo - Stores the new information as a String
      fieldType - Stores the field name as a string
      connection - Initiates a connection to the database via the jdbc:mysql: channel on localhost
      statement - initiates a direct line to the database to execute mySQL statements
      intNewInfo - Stores the converted newInfo as an Integer
      doubleNewInfo - Stores the converted newInfo as a Double

    • deleteProjectQuery

      public static void deleteProjectQuery(int projectNum)
      This Connects to the mySQL poisepms database and creates a direct line for running the appropriate queries. Deletes the appropriate project infomation based on the project number. Displays a message and calls a method to display all the projects when deleted successfully.
      Starts to delete from the tables that use the project number as a FOREIGN KEY first. Lastly deletes from the table that uses the project number as the primary key
      Parameters:
      projectNum - Stores the project number
      connection - Initiates a connection to the database via the jdbc:mysql: channel on localhost
      statement - initiates a direct line to the database to execute mySQL statements

    • finaliseProjectQuery

      public static void finaliseProjectQuery(Scanner scan, int projectNum, String date)
      This Connects to the mySQL poisepms database and creates a direct line for running the appropriate queries. Updates the appropriate project to finalised by making it true. Also updates the date it was finalised on based on the project number. Displays a message and the date the project was finalised on when the project has been updated successfully.
      Parameters:
      scan - initiates the Scanner class to get the users input
      projectNum - Stores the project number
      date - stores the date the project was finalised on
      connection - Initiates a connection to the database via the jdbc:mysql: channel on localhost
      statement - initiates a direct line to the database to execute mySQL statements

    • displayAllProjects

      public static void displayAllProjects()
      This Connects to the mySQL poisepms database and creates a direct line for running the appropriate queries. Displays all the project names and thier approprate team members in table format.
      Parameters:
      connection - Initiates a connection to the database via the jdbc:mysql: channel on localhost
      statement - initiates a direct line to the database to execute mySQL statements
      results - Stores the data selected by the mySQL statement

    • isIdValidQuery

      public static boolean isIdValidQuery(int personId, String person)
      This Connects to the mySQL poisepms database and creates a direct line for running the appropriate queries. Selects the apropriate table and id field to check if the selected id number exsits in the database. Returns false if nothing is found else returns true.
      Parameters:
      personId - Stores the id number the user enter
      person - stores the name of the table and field
      connection - Initiates a connection to the database via the jdbc:mysql: channel on localhost
      statement - initiates a direct line to the database to execute mySQL statements
      results - Stores the data selected by the mySQL statement
      Returns:
      true/false

    • isIdValidQuery

      public static boolean isIdValidQuery(int num)
      This Connects to the mySQL poisepms database and creates a direct line for running the appropriate queries. Selects the projects table to check if the selected project number exsits in the database. Returns false if nothing is found else returns true.
      Parameters:
      num - Stores the project number that the user entered
      connection - Initiates a connection to the database via the jdbc:mysql: channel on localhost
      statement - initiates a direct line to the database to execute mySQL statements
      results - Stores the data selected by the mySQL statement
      Returns:
      true/false
